title: In which Ian Fleming novel did James Bond first make an appearance? - Quora

response.answer_text: James Bond first appeared in the novel Casino Royale, which I personally liked better than either of the films with the same name. The first James Bond novel to be made into a movie was Dr. No, starring Sean Connery. Not that it matters, but I liked both the novel and film versions of this one.
Casino Royale. It put him in a setting where having expensive suits and cars would actually let him blend in rather than stand out so almost made sense.
